## Quarto

```{r}
data <- read.csv("C:\\Users/Sever/Nextcloud/ResiDEvo/data/2023_ScleroPhenotypes/stats_tables/2023_10_16_IF_species_estimates.csv", header=T)

rownames(data) <- data[,1]
data <- data[,-1]
colnames(data) = c("logit(IF)", "SE", "p(IF)")
```

```{r}
library(kableExtra)

kbl(data, booktabs = T, digits=2
    ) %>% 
  kable_styling(latex_options = "striped") %>% 
  column_spec(1, italic = T)

```
